# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.1.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

## [0.1.3] - 2025

### Added

- Build verification step in CI
- Codecov badge in README
- Demo GIF (animated)
- Pillow to dev dependencies for GIF generation
- Video tutorial scripts (docs/video_tutorials.md)
- Architecture diagrams (docs/architecture.md)
- Full CLI reference (docs/cli_reference.md)
- Development setup guide (docs/development_setup.md)
- Development tools documentation (docs/development_tools.md)

### Changed

- Development status: Alpha â†’ Beta
- Updated docs/testing.md: removed references to deleted test files, fixed RequestBuilder example
- Fixed coverage exclude pattern in pyproject.toml

## [0.1.2] - 2024

### Added

- GraphQL support
- WebSocket support
- OpenAPI inspection
- Request history
- Parallel request execution
- Environment configuration
- Curl command generation

## [0.1.0] - 2024

### Added

- Initial release
- Basic HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
- Colored output with syntax highlighting
- JSON/XML/HTML formatting
- Headers and parameters support
- Configuration file support
